com.mycompany.cupcake.data

Class CupcakeDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mycompany.cupcake.data.CupcakeDAO

  • public class CupcakeDAO
extends Object
    This class handles all communication with the "cupcakedb" MySQL database. It fetches information as well as inserts into the database. All methods requiring user input uses PreparedStatements to avoid SQLInjection issues.
    Author:
    Simon Asholt Norup
